mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_menu
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from sys_menu where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and delete_flag=1

select DISTINCT
from sys_menu as sm join ums_role_menu as rm on sm.id= rm.menu_id where rm.role_id in
#{id}

select DISTINCT
from sys_menu as sm join ums_role_menu as rm on sm.id= rm.menu_id where find_in_set(rm.role_id,(select ua.role from ums_admin as ua where id= #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT})) and delete_flag=0
